title: P6 How do I import contacts to or export contacts from the SIM
answer:
ÔÅ¨ Importing contacts to the SIM card
1. Touch Contacts > > Manage contacts > Copy contacts > Phone.
2. Select the desired contacts, and touch Copy > SIM > OK.

 

 

Exporting contacts from a SIM card
1. Touch Contacts > > Manage contacts > Copy contacts > SIM.
2. Select the desired contacts, and touch Copy > Phone > OK.
